Holotype and type locality
. Male, cw 26.5 , cl 15.8 (partially dearticulated), USNM 19487 . Costa Rica , Cartago Province, between La Flor and Torito.

Remarks .
Pretzmann ( 1980 : 653 )
recorded four females from Agua Buena River ( NHMW 4017 ) but their identification is doubtful because other pseudothelphusid species are recorded from the same area (e.g.
Allacanthos pittieri
, see below).
